title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategies Workshop for Engineering Problem-Solving Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering principles and experience in solving social issues
context.additional_context: Learners perform projects applying an engineering approach to solve social issues, using web-based learning materials as supplementary resources in a limited technological environment utilizing smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 90% of engineering problem-solving projects within three months using self-regulated learning strategies
Learners can achieve a score of 3.5 or higher on a 4-level evaluation scale for smartphone-based tool utilization during the learning planning-execution-evaluation process
Learning outcomes can be improved by over 20% through peer feedback and reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
